curam.util.resources
Interface EnvironmentConstants.Security

Enclosing interface:
EnvironmentConstants
public static interface EnvironmentConstants.Security

These settings configure the authentication behavior of Curam.

Field Detail

kBreakinThreshold

static final java.lang.String kBreakinThreshold
Default: 3. The number of consecutive break-in attempts that are allowed before an account is locked out. Property name : curam.security.breakInThreshold

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kPasswordWarningPeriod

static final java.lang.String kPasswordWarningPeriod
The number of days, in advance, that a user should be warned (on login) that their password is about to expire. Property name : curam.security.passwordexpiry.warningperiod

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kLoginWarningPeriod

static final java.lang.String kLoginWarningPeriod
Default: 1. The number of logins, in advance, that a user should be warned (on login) that they have a limited number of logins in which they must change their password. Property name : curam.security.loginattempts.warningperiod

See Also:

kAuthorisationStatus

static final java.lang.String kAuthorisationStatus
Default: false. Suppress the authorization checks normally performed by Curam. Property name : curam.security.disable.authorisation

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kCaseSensitive

static final java.lang.String kCaseSensitive
Authentication and authorization of usernames is case sensitive by default. When this property is set to false the authentication and authorization mechanisms will ignore the case of the user. If duplicate case insensitive user names exist (e.g. caseworker, CaseWorker), authentication will fail due to an ambiguous user name. Such duplicate names will also cause the security cache to fail to initialize. Property name : curam.security.casesensitive

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kCustomSecurity

static final java.lang.String kCustomSecurity
The fully qualified name of the class implementing the curam.util.security.ExternalAccessSecurity interface. This class implements the custom authentication mechanism for External Users. Property name : curam.custom.externalaccess.implementation

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kCustomAuthentication

static final java.lang.String kCustomAuthentication
The fully qualified name of the class implementing the curam.util.security.CustomAuthenticator interface. This class implements custom authentication verifications that will be invoked during the authentication process. Property name : curam.custom.authentication.implementation

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kCustomUserScope

static final java.lang.String kCustomUserScope
The fully qualified name of the class implementing the curam.util.security.UserScope interface. This class determines the type of User logging into the application, i.e. INTERNAL or EXTERNAL. Property name : curam.custom.userscope.implementation

See Also:
Constant Field Values
